summary: A real-time dark comedy about a science geek who tangles with a clutch of Russian gangsters after he delivers them the wrong computer disk.
cast: Diego Luna|Lucas Crespi|Norman Sotolongo|Jesús Ochoa|Martha Tenorio|Rafael Inclán|Rosa María Bianchi|José María Yazpik|Marta Belaustegui|Eugenio Montessoro|Carmen Madrid|Daniel Giménez Cacho|Aleksis Sanchez Kabatskiy|Jorge Zárate|Enoc Leaño|Andres Valdés|Mariano Osorio|Vicky Fox|Maclovia González|Danil Artamonov
title: Nicotina
